translation.zh: NETFLIX 出品
科丽茜之舞
各位请上车！

translation.en: It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.zh: 《摇摆列车》的时间到了

translation.en: Tonight's special guests include Upton and the Get Down Bunch,
translation.zh: 今晚的特别来宾有乌普顿及起舞一伙
迷你瓦内萨和车篷组合

translation.en: And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion,
translation.zh: 现在有请你们的机动车头

translation.en: everybody's favorite friend of funk-- D-d-d-d-DJ Train Trax!
translation.zh: 大家最爱的放克之友 火车崔克斯
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！

translation.en: Hey, rollers and shakers, rockers and breakers!
translation.zh: 嗨 翩翩起舞、“车”舞足蹈的各位

translation.en: Hey, Loose Caboose, how you feelin' tonight?
translation.zh: 脱节守车 你今晚感觉如何？
我觉得我快要死了
听起来很严重的样子
是啊

translation.en: I'm dying to see tonight's star performer!
translation.zh: 我等不及想看今晚的表演明星快激动死了

translation.en: Well, let's get right to it, then. Wicka-wicka woo-woo!
translation.zh: 那么我们快点开始吧喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] You ready to get down?
translation.zh: 你们准备好起舞了吗？
好耶！

translation.en: Come on, Chrissy. [mimicking Loose Caboose] Let's get down.
translation.zh: 来吧 科丽茜 我们来跳吧

translation.en: Try this one. Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 来试试这样跳 噢 耶！
噢 耶！

translation.en: Now, let's do the Truck Truck Caboose.
translation.zh: 现在我们来跳守车转圈舞
-准备好了吗？-好了

translation.en: Oh, I love the Truck Truck Caboose!
translation.zh: 我真爱守车转圈舞

translation.en: OK! OK! Here comes a new one I made up.
translation.zh: 好了 这个是我新编出来的舞蹈
好了 科丽茜 你来

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! -Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! -Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: -好的！-好耶！
你看看你们两个
瞧瞧你们轮胎的舞步！
真不错
好棒 你跳得不错
这叫什么舞？
我还没想好

translation.en: You two make a really great dance duo.
translation.zh: 你们两个跳起舞来真是好搭档
和科里一起跳！

translation.en: [laughs] So, do you think we'll win?
translation.zh: 你们觉得我们会赢吗？

translation.en: Are you kidding? With those moves?
translation.zh: 你开什么玩笑？靠这些舞步？

translation.en: You two are going to be great at the talent show!
translation.zh: 你们会在达人秀上一展风姿的

translation.en: [laughs] Maybe I'll dust off the ol' keytar and play something from my rock opera.
translation.zh: 也许我可以拿出许久不用的键盘吉他来弹一首摇滚歌剧

translation.en: You two are going to be great at the talent show!
translation.zh: 你们会在达人秀上一展风姿的
喂 那我呢？

translation.en: I-- I'm just trying to save you from your crippling stage fright.
translation.zh: 你总是会怯场 我在帮你救场呢

translation.en: Ooh, right. I forgot about that.
translation.zh: 对啊 我都忘了

translation.en: Ready for the show, you two?
translation.zh: 你们准备好了吗？
-好了-好了

translation.en: Now, what do we have to remember before any performance?
translation.zh: 好了 上台表演之前我们要记住做什么？
要去洗手间
然后呢…

translation.en: If you play with fire, you're gonna get burned.
translation.zh: 如果玩火的话 会被烧伤的

translation.en: Not sure how that works for the talent show,
translation.zh: 虽然不知道这和达人秀有什么关系
不过没错 除此以外…
要尽情享受
没错
哇！

translation.en: Whoa is right! Looks like the whole town showed up.
translation.zh: 真让人大吃一惊 看样子大家都来了

translation.en: Come on, Chrissy. Let's go! Oh, yay!
translation.zh: -快点 科丽茜 走吧-好耶

translation.en: [Papa] Ooh, they've got corn dogs over there!
translation.zh: 那边有卖玉米热狗的
什么？不会吧

translation.en: I don't want to hear your exhaust running all night.
translation.zh: 我可不想一整晚都听你轰隆隆排气

translation.en: Welcome to the Bumperton Hills 18th Annual Talent Show!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到邦伯顿山第18届年度达人秀
开始了

translation.en: Please give it up for your humble host and 17-time winner,
translation.zh: 请掌声欢迎鄙人担当你们的主持人也是连续17届胜者
艾莎尔·雨刮镜医生
就是我
耶！
太棒了 雨刮镜医生！

translation.en: Let's hear it for our first contestant, Mrs. O'Tool.
translation.zh: 首先有请我们第一位参赛者奥图尔太太
借过一下 卡尔森一家

translation.en: Whoo! You got this, babe! Whoo-ooh!
translation.zh: 你可以的 亲爱的
太棒了！

translation.en: What has four wheels and flies?
translation.zh: 什么东西有四个轮子还有苍蝇飞舞？
是我

translation.en: -Get it? -[drum sting] Me! A garbage truck.
translation.zh: 懂了吗？是我 垃圾车

translation.en: Wow! Everyone is really good. Wow!
translation.zh: -哇 大家都很厉害呢-哇！

translation.en: Ugh, finally. After 28 years of cleaning up messes,
translation.zh: 做了28年的清理工作 我终于等到了
上台演唱的机会

translation.en: Oh, there you are. Fenderson's called for you.
translation.zh: 你在这里啊 芬德森在找你呢

translation.en: There's an oil spill on aisle five.
translation.zh: 五排观众有漏油
下一个是你们了 卡尔森兄妹
-准备好了吗？-我准备好了
-准备好了吗？-我准备好了 -科丽茜？-准备好了
-科丽茜？-准备好了
好极了！

translation.en: [breathes out rhythmically] OK, we've got this.
translation.zh: 好的 我们可以做到

translation.en: Up next, Cory and Chrissy Carson!
translation.zh: 接下来是科里和科丽茜·卡尔森兄妹
我们可以的

translation.en: OK, wish us luck! Good luck!
translation.zh: -好了 祝我们好运吧-祝你们好运！
我不敢看了
噢 耶！
-噢 耶！-噢 耶！

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: -噢 耶！-噢 耶！ 噢 耶！
噢 耶！
你们跳得真棒

translation.en: OK, Chrissy, let's do the secret move I showed you.
translation.zh: 好了 科丽茜我们来展示一下我教你的秘密舞步吧
-耶 科丽茜好棒！-耶 科丽茜好棒！
科丽茜？
铛铛！
好棒！
好了 科丽茜 我们走吧
观众反响很热烈呢
你们两个很棒
谢谢 太棒了 跳得好 科丽茜
跳舞！

translation.en: [laughs] I think you're gonna have to show me how to do that move. Ohh.
translation.zh: 你得教教我怎么跳那个舞步

translation.en: Let's thank all the contestants for their hard work today.
translation.zh: 感谢所有参赛者今天的卖力表演
大家都很棒

translation.en: But, not everyone can be a winner...
translation.zh: 但并不是所有人都能胜出…
更不要提连胜17次了
投票结果出来了
获胜者是…
科里·卡尔森和科丽茜·卡尔森！
我们赢了！
谢谢 谢谢大家！
恭喜你们 科里
那位舞台明星呢？
舞台明星？
-科丽茜！-去吧
科丽茜！
科丽茜！

translation.en: OK. How about a group picture?
translation.zh: 好了 我们一起来拍照吧？

translation.en: Cory, would you switch places with Chrissy?
translation.zh: 科里 你能不能和科丽茜换个位置？你有点…

translation.en: You're, uh-- [chuckles] You're blockin' the trophy.
translation.zh: 科里 你能不能和科丽茜换个位置？你有点… 你有点挡住奖杯了
好的
好了 大家一起说“17”
-十七-十七

translation.en: A victory like this calls for some ice cream!
translation.zh: 今晚的胜利值得吃冰淇淋庆祝
-冰淇淋！-耶！
嘿！ 那是卡尔森家的小孩儿
你们好
没错 就是我
什么？
你真可爱

translation.en: [fan girl] Chrissy, can you show us that dance?
translation.zh: 科丽茜 能不能给我们表演下舞步？

translation.en: Hey, I could show it to you.
translation.zh: 嘿 我可以给你们表演的

translation.en: Oh, yeah, you're the backup dancer, right?
translation.zh: 对哦 你是她的那个伴舞吧？
不 其实…

translation.en: Ooh, Chrissy! You think you can do that dance for us?
translation.zh: 科丽茜你能不能给我们跳下那个舞？

translation.en: [sing-songy] I've got some music! Hit it!
translation.zh: 我这里有音乐 开播！
跳舞
来吧 科丽茜 跳吧
好的
看啊 她在那边 是科丽茜！

translation.en: Hey, check me out. [sing-songy] I'm doing "The Chrissy!"
translation.zh: 嘿 快来看看 我在跳科丽茜之舞
科丽茜之舞？

translation.en: I'm gonna make that kid a star.
translation.zh: 我要把那个孩子打造成明星

translation.en: Hey, Chrissy! Do you know what a franchise is?
translation.zh: 嘿 科丽茜你知道什么是特许经营吗？
晚上好 卡尔森一家
你好 蒸汽车先生
嘿 我看到你跳舞了
跳得很棒噢 科丽茜

translation.en: Uh, actually, we're a dancing team.
translation.zh: 其实 我们是跳舞组合
哎呀 我刚才怎么说的？
我是想说 “跳得好 卡尔森兄妹”
好吧 谢谢啦

translation.en: Hey, you know, I have a nephew who really likes to dance.
translation.zh: 对了 我有个侄子 他很喜欢跳舞
我会告诉他…

translation.en: Whoa! Don't mean to be rude, but looks like I'm going left.
translation.zh: 不好意思 但我要左拐了
表演跳得很棒噢
我爱你 科丽茜 再见！

translation.en: Looks like you have a fan, Chrissy.
translation.zh: 看样子你有粉丝了 科丽茜
终于回家了
爸爸 电话！
来得正是时候呢
你没事吧 亲爱的？
妈妈
是啊 一切都挺好的
挺好的？
是啊 只不过…

translation.en: how come everyone likes Chrissy so much?
translation.zh: 为什么大家都这么喜欢科丽茜？

translation.en: Why don't I have any fans?
translation.zh: 为什么我没有粉丝？
亲爱的 我就是你的粉丝
那不算
什么？我当然算了

translation.en: I just mean everyone's cheering for Chrissy.
translation.zh: 我是说大家都为科丽茜欢呼

translation.en: It's like I wasn't even there.
translation.zh: 就好像看不见我似的

translation.en: Oh, Cory. Chrissy didn't take anything away from you.
translation.zh: 科里 科丽茜并没有夺走你什么

translation.en: She just wanted to have fun with you. And you guys won, together.
translation.zh: 她只是想和你一起享受你们是一起赢得比赛的
确实还挺有趣的
终于露出笑容了

translation.en: And besides, it was just a silly little talent show.
translation.zh: 再说那只是个小小的娱乐达人秀而已
是啊 也许你说得对

translation.en: Did you eat those corn dogs?
translation.zh: 你吃了玉米热狗吗？
是啊

translation.en: But that's not why my engine's racing.
translation.zh: 但我的引擎这样气喘吁吁不是因为这个

translation.en: [exhales] Mr. Coaltrain just called and he sent the video to his nephew.
translation.zh: 蒸汽车先生刚刚打来电话他把视频发给了他的侄子
-然后呢？-然后呢？ “然后呢？” 然后…
他的侄子就是火…
他的侄子就是火… 火车崔克斯

translation.en: Oh, Chrissy, you said I could tell them.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 你说过让我告诉他们的
-什么？-什么？
-什么？-什么？ 火车崔克斯？他怎么说的？
火车崔克斯？他怎么说的？

translation.en: He said he loved your dance!
translation.zh: 他说他很喜欢你们的舞蹈

translation.en: He loved it so much he wants you to be on his show!
translation.zh: 他真的很喜欢所以想让你们上他的节目

translation.en: Roll Train is coming to Bumperton Hills!
translation.zh: 《摇摆列车》要来邦伯顿山了
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
真是开心的一天！

translation.en: Oh, all right, kids. [chuckles] It's time to get ready for bed.
translation.zh: 好了 孩子们 该准备上床睡觉了
不要！

translation.en: Hey, get back here, you little dance machine.
translation.zh: 嘿 快回来 你这个跳舞的小家伙

translation.en: I'm gonna dance for DJ Train Trax.
translation.zh: 我要给火车崔克斯表演跳舞了

translation.en: [yawns] Time to grab the newspaper and see what that old Carmaduke is up to.
translation.zh: 该看看报纸了瞧瞧车默杜克画到哪里了

translation.en: Hey! My dance made the front page!
translation.zh: 嘿 我跳的舞上头条了！

translation.en: "The Chrissy is the best dance ever."
translation.zh: （邦伯顿号角报） “科丽茜之舞是史上最棒舞蹈”
“科丽茜之舞”？
妈妈！

translation.en: [Papa] Chrissy. Have some waffle, not just the syrup.
translation.zh: 科丽茜 吃点华夫饼 不要只吃糖浆
科丽茜！
随便吧
科里 早上好 来点糖浆吗？
不用了 爸爸
有人看见妈妈了吗？
-早上好 瞌睡虫-嗨 弗兰妮

translation.en: Frannie? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 弗兰妮 你怎么在这里？
弗兰妮想在早餐时

translation.en: to a little business presentation over breakfast.
translation.zh: 给我们做个小小商业演讲

translation.en: It's been very impressive so far.
translation.zh: 目前为止听起来很厉害呢
谢谢 卡尔森太太

translation.en: Now, if you'll point your attention
translation.zh: 好了 如果你们看一下

translation.en: towards this very professional graph I made,
translation.zh: 我做的这个非常专业的图表

translation.en: the red squiggly line indicates the dance has been
translation.zh: 这个红色的弯曲线条表示 从昨晚开始这支舞蹈的流行度直线上升

translation.en: skyrocketing in popularity since last night.
translation.zh: 从昨晚开始这支舞蹈的流行度直线上升
有了这样的支持率…
嗯 也许赚到大学学费也可以噢？

translation.en: Ooh, I like the sound of that!
translation.zh: 听起来很不错呢

translation.en: Would you like some more to eat, sweetie?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 想再吃点什么吗？
不用了 谢谢 我很饱

translation.en: I couldn't eat another bite of your delicious cooking.
translation.zh: 你做的美味早餐我一口也吃不下了

translation.en: Besides, we don't really have any time
translation.zh: 而且 我们也没有太多时间了

translation.en: if we're gonna make it to the Roll Train commercial shoot.
translation.zh: 我们要去拍摄《摇摆列车》的宣传片呢
《摇摆列车》的宣传片？

translation.en: Do you think DJ Train Trax is gonna be there?
translation.zh: 你觉得火车崔克斯会在场吗？
我想肯定会 亲爱的

translation.en: It's not Roll Train without the DJ.
translation.zh: 没有主持人 就没有《摇摆列车》
好了 大家伙儿 我们走吧
我们走 孩子们

translation.en: -Come on, Chrissy! -[Papa] Haha! Come on, come on, come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: -快点 科丽茜-我们快点走
好兴奋啊

translation.en: I can't wait to meet DJ Train Trax!
translation.zh: 我等不及要见火车崔克斯了
不会吧
“科丽茜之舞”？

translation.en: Um... Maybe they haven't finished adding your name
translation.zh: 也许他们还没来得及

translation.en: to the giant sign in the middle of town.
translation.zh: 在这个镇中心的大广告牌上写你的名字
是啊

translation.en: Uh, I'm sure it's a work in progress.
translation.zh: 这个牌子肯定还没写完呢

translation.en: I don't know. "The Chrissy" is spelled so big
translation.zh: 我不觉得 “科丽茜之舞”写得这么大应该写不下“科里”了
“科丽茜之舞”写得这么大应该写不下“科里”了
你们看看啊

translation.en: I bet you could see it from the highway.
translation.zh: 这个牌子连高速路上都能看到

translation.en: Hey, why don't we go inside?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们进去吧？
摇摆列车！
科里 你快来呀

translation.en: Um, Mama? We did the dance together.
translation.zh: 妈妈 这个舞蹈是我们一起跳的

translation.en: Why are they calling it "The Chrissy"?
translation.zh: 为什么他们叫它“科丽茜之舞”？
亲爱的 我很替你难过

translation.en: Maybe we can go talk to someone to get this all straightened out.
translation.zh: 也许我们可以找个人聊一下把这件事处理好

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's a great idea.
translation.zh: 是啊 这个主意很不错
好的
来看看
摇摆列车 太棒了！

translation.en: [Cory] It's really Roll Train. This is so cool!
translation.zh: 真的是摇摆列车 好酷啊！

translation.en: This is all for you, my superstar.
translation.zh: 这些都是为你准备的 我的超级明星

translation.en: OK, guys! Can we go tell somebody about the thing now?
translation.zh: 好了 我们能不能找个人说说这事？
找人说什么？

translation.en: -[all gasp] -[Mama] Oh, my gosh! It's Loose Caboose! Oh, wow! You're really famous!
translation.zh: 天呐！是脱节守车 哇 你超有名的
而且超级可爱

translation.en: I wish I could squeeze your cheek!
translation.zh: 我真想捏捏你的脸蛋

translation.en: Uh, but, I won't! Unless you want me to.
translation.zh: 不过我不会的 除非你想让我捏
不用了

translation.en: Papa, don't you have something you want to talk to the Caboose about?
translation.zh: 爸爸 你不是有话要对守车说吗？

translation.en: Oh, right! Can you please sign my bumper sticker?
translation.zh: 没错！你能不能在我的贴纸上签名？

translation.en: No. Mama, remember? The thing we were gonna tell them!
translation.zh: 不是的 妈妈 还记得吗？我们要告诉他们的那件事

translation.en: Oh! [laughs] Of course. There's been a little mix up.
translation.zh: 当然！有件事有点小误会

translation.en: I'd like you to meet my two children, Cory and Chrissy.
translation.zh: 这两位是我的孩子 科里和科丽茜
妈妈！

translation.en: Oh! [chuckles] Whoops! Sorry, I'm a little nervous.
translation.zh: 哎呀 抱歉 我有点紧张

translation.en: This is the one that came up with the dance.
translation.zh: 这位是编出那个舞步的孩子

translation.en: Of course! Chrissy came up with the dance.
translation.zh: 当然了 是科丽茜编出的舞步
所以才叫科丽茜之舞
不 不是那样的

translation.en: So, you didn't come up with the dance? This one did. Congrats!
translation.zh: 所以不是你编出来的吗？是另一位啊 恭喜！
不是的

translation.en: What we're trying to say is that Cory's the one who--
translation.zh: 我们是想说 科里才是…
他来了
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
永远都听不腻
很好 舞台一切正常

translation.en: Great job, everybody. It's gonna be a great show.
translation.zh: 做得好 各位 这次的节目会很棒的
是火车崔克斯！

translation.en: Yo! What a radical-looking group of groovy cars we have over here!
translation.zh: 哟 这边的帅气小车们看起来太给力了！

translation.en: My name is DJ Train Trax. Nice to meet you all.
translation.zh: 我是火车崔克斯 很高兴见到你们

translation.en: My name's Cory, Cory Carson! I'm your biggest fan ever!
translation.zh: 我叫科里 科里·卡尔森我是你的头号粉丝
好极了 小家伙

translation.en: And we're the Carson family. I'm Mama, this is Papa--
translation.zh: 我们是卡尔森一家我是妈妈 这位是爸爸

translation.en: And I think I already know who this little lady is.
translation.zh: 我已经知道这位小姑娘是谁了
你就是科丽茜·卡尔森吧

translation.en: [DJ Train Trax] Your dance is really groovy stuff!
translation.zh: 你的舞步真的很时髦呢

translation.en: Uh, Mr. Trax, there's something I wanted to tell you--
translation.zh: 崔克斯先生 有件事我想告诉你

translation.en: And I'm Frannie Fenderson of Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
translation.zh: 我是弗兰妮·芬德森艺人经纪公司的弗兰妮·芬德森

translation.en: Chrissy, here, is one of my most promising clients.
translation.zh: 这位科丽茜是我们最有前途的艺人之一

translation.en: Nice! Glad to see this little superstar's in good hands.
translation.zh: 很好 这位超级小明星能受到这样的照顾 真是太好了

translation.en: Oh-ho-ho. We got big plans. We're gonna actually take her global.
translation.zh: 我们有宏伟计划要让她成为全球明星

translation.en: Actually-- [nervous chuckle] that reminds me, there's a thing I wanted to tell you.
translation.zh: 这倒是提醒我了 有件事我想告诉你
好的 说吧
你们在这里啊

translation.en: Chrissy and Cory, we've got a commercial shoot to do.
translation.zh: 科丽茜和科里 我们还要拍宣传片呢

translation.en: We need to get started. Let's get you guys against that backdrop.
translation.zh: 现在要开始了你们去那边那个背景幕吧
这边走

translation.en: [Cory] Uh, Mr. Trax? What is it, little man?
translation.zh: -崔克斯先生？-怎么了 小朋友？

translation.en: Hey, Trax? We need to rehearse the opening routine, one more time.
translation.zh: 崔克斯 我们得再彩排一次开场序幕

translation.en: We'll talk later, little guy. Stay groovy.
translation.zh: 小朋友 之后再聊吧 要继续酷下去噢

translation.en: Cory! What's the hold up, kiddo?
translation.zh: 科里 你在干什么呢 孩子？
该我们大显身手了
来吧！
摇摆列车！科里 跳舞！
很棒噢 科丽茜

translation.en: [whispering] I can see why she's the star.
translation.zh: 我能看出她的明星潜质

translation.en: [normal] Uh, Cory? Try and look like you're having fun.
translation.zh: 科里 你要摆出享受乐趣的样子
亲爱的 要对着镜头微笑
这样反而更糟了
也许不要这样咧嘴

translation.en: I'm sensing a serious lack of grooviness over here.
translation.zh: 这里的气氛似乎没那么棒了

translation.en: You can't dance without some jams.
translation.zh: 没有音乐怎么欢跳呢
耶 跳起来！
没错 用心来感受！
试试180度反向转圈

translation.en: Ha-ha! That's it! Get into it.
translation.zh: 没错 投入进去！
看起来很棒噢 孩子们
耶！
没错 很不错

translation.en: And, cut! Great job, everybody. I think we got everything we need, right?
translation.zh: 好了 干得好 各位我们要拍的都拍好了吧？
是啊

translation.en: That was amazing, Chrissy! The camera loves you.
translation.zh: 刚刚太棒了 科丽茜 你很上镜呢 真是天生的明星

translation.en: You were born to be a star.
translation.zh: 你很上镜呢 真是天生的明星

translation.en: Good work, guys! I'll see you two at the show.
translation.zh: 你们跳得真好！那就之后节目见了
等一下 火车崔克斯？
嘿 怎么？

translation.en: The dance. It's my dance. I came up with it.
translation.zh: 那支舞蹈 是我编的舞蹈是我想出来的
是啊 小家伙 我知道
你知道？

translation.en: Yeah. You and your sister did a great job coming up with it!
translation.zh: 是啊 你和你的小妹妹编出来的你们很棒的
谢谢你 但我想说 这其实不是科丽茜之舞

translation.en: what I mean is, it's not really "The Chrissy."
translation.zh: 但我想说 这其实不是科丽茜之舞

translation.en: [producer] Trax, we need you for the meeting!
translation.zh: 崔克斯 你要来开会了

translation.en: Hey, little man, I gotta go, but nice work.
translation.zh: 小家伙 我得走了 你跳得很棒

translation.en: Can't wait to see The Chrissy on the show.
translation.zh: 我等不及在节目上看科丽茜之舞了
可是… 这是我的舞蹈

translation.en: Hey, Cory! Time is money, baby! Let's roll out!
translation.zh: 嘿 科里 时间就是金钱 亲爱的我们快走吧
很棒吧？

translation.en: Cool! Sure is a lot of stuff.
translation.zh: -好厉害！-真的有很多东西呢
我喜欢
科丽茜！

translation.en: We've got it all-- bumper stickers, mugs, key chains, air fresheners,
translation.zh: 我们这里什么都有贴纸、杯子、钥匙链、空气清洁剂

translation.en: those little handle things for eating corn on the cob.
translation.zh: 还有吃玉米时用的小手柄
都是收藏品呢！
是我
我的呢？
你看看身后
橡皮塞子？
我是橡皮塞子？

translation.en: We had to diversify the product line,
translation.zh: 我们要让产品线多元化

translation.en: and the resemblance is kind of uncanny.
translation.zh: 而且你和橡皮塞子出奇地相似
这真是太过分了

translation.en: I have to find a way to win back my dance move.
translation.zh: 我要想办法赢回我的舞步
你的舞步？
是啊 你知道的
你是说科丽茜之舞

translation.en: Gah! That's what I'm talking about!
translation.zh: 我说的正是这件事！

translation.en: Too bad you can't come up with a better dance move.
translation.zh: 真可惜你想不出更好的舞步了

translation.en: My Aunt Susan's a great dancer,
translation.zh: 我的姑姑苏珊跳舞很厉害

translation.en: and she invented upwards of four different moves.
translation.zh: 她发明了四种以上的舞步
等一下 你再说一遍
-我的姑姑苏珊…-不 之前的那句

translation.en: Oh, uh, you mean The Chrissy? No, after that.
translation.zh: -你是说科丽茜之舞？-不 之后的那句

translation.en: Ugh, never mind. I know what I have to do.
translation.zh: 算了 我知道我该做什么了

translation.en: I'm going to invent a new dance move called "The Cory,"
translation.zh: 我要发明一种新的舞步就叫做科里之舞

translation.en: and it will be the greatest dance of all time!
translation.zh: 我要让它成为史上最棒的舞步！

translation.en: And I'll make a healthy snack.
translation.zh: 我要去做健康零食了
科里？
你没事吧？

translation.en: OK, what about this one? Ready?
translation.zh: 好 那这个怎么样？准备好了吗？
准备好了

translation.en: Don't blink or you'll miss it!
translation.zh: 别眨眼 不然你就错过了
我不会眨眼的
好了 来了
铛铛！

translation.en: Well, uh, I've-- I've never seen anything like it before.
translation.zh: 我可从来没见过这样的舞步
并不怎么样

translation.en: Hey, it's a work in progress.
translation.zh: 嘿 他还在改进之中

translation.en: Why don't you try doing this?
translation.zh: 不如你试试这样？

translation.en: Ooh-hoo! Uh-huh! Oh, yeah! You got it! You got it! Mm-hmm!
translation.zh: 好耶 你可以的

translation.en: Yeah, yeah! And move your tires like this.
translation.zh: 对 像这样跳动你的轮胎

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! Huh! Oh, yeah! [grunting] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 噢 耶

translation.en: Yeah, that's good! Try wigglin' a little bit more.
translation.zh: 很不错噢 再多扭动扭动
好了 现在转圈
再快一点

translation.en: [panting] Hey, this feels good. What do you think, Freddie?
translation.zh: 这感觉很棒 你觉得如何 弗莱迪？
嗯…

translation.en: I'm doing The Chrissy, aren't I?
translation.zh: 我在跳科丽茜之舞 是吧？
是啊
不过看起来很棒

translation.en: Come on, Freddie. Time to kick it up a notch.
translation.zh: 拜托 弗莱迪 该改进一下舞步了
没错

translation.en: ♪ Hero of orange, stripes of white ♪
translation.zh: 小小英雄 白色线条

translation.en: ♪ Move like the wind and ready to fight ♪
translation.zh: 轻盈飘动 准备行动

translation.en: ♪ There's a rhythm in me That I have to find ♪
translation.zh: 我的心中 有个节奏
规律节拍
我就是一位跳舞男孩
总是不断摇摆
找到节奏

translation.en: ♪ I'll walk through fire ♪ ♪ To the edge of time ♪
translation.zh: 赴汤蹈火 走向时间边缘

translation.en: ♪ Won't stop till the whole wide world ♪ ♪ Can see me shine ♪
translation.zh: 永不停止 直到全世界看到我闪耀

translation.en: ♪ Every dancer has to become the dance ♪
translation.zh: 每位跳舞者都要与舞蹈融为一体

translation.en: ♪ And I-- I think I finally found it This time ♪
translation.zh: 而我 我想这次我终于找到了
不 这次没有

translation.en: ♪ There's a rhythm I still have to find ♪
translation.zh: 我还是要找到那个节奏
规律节拍

translation.en: ♪ I can feel it shine, shine, shine ♪
translation.zh: 我能感受到它在闪耀
不断闪耀

translation.en: ♪ I'll race through forests And cross the open seas ♪
translation.zh: 我要冲过森林 跨过洋洋大海

translation.en: Whoa! Ooh! ♪ Till I find ♪ ♪ The magic rhythm that's in me ♪ Whoa! Whoa!
translation.zh: 直到我找到内心的魔力节拍
就是这个了！

translation.en: Come over here, everybody! Cory's got a new dance!
translation.zh: 大家都过来 科里创建了新舞步

translation.en: -[dance music playing] -Whoa. Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 噢 耶！
好厉害啊！

translation.en: I loved what you were doing with your tires!
translation.zh: 我超爱你轮胎的动作
那才是我的朋友

translation.en: [chanting] Go Cory! Go Cory! Go Cory!
translation.zh: 好厉害 科里！ 你做到了！
和科里一起跳

translation.en: I've never seen anything like that. What is that called?
translation.zh: 我从没见过这样的舞步那叫什么舞蹈？
科里之舞
有请我们的第一位来宾

translation.en: He's from a small town but has some big talent!
translation.zh: 他来自小镇 但才华冲天
掌声有请…

translation.en: -[pauses TV] -Cory Carson, performing his new dance,
translation.zh: 科里·卡尔森来表演他的新舞步
科里之舞

translation.en: Whoa! Oh, yeah! It's The Cory! It's The Cory!
translation.zh: 噢 耶！是科里之舞

translation.en: That was star-tastic! Can we see that again?
translation.zh: 真是星光闪耀！能不能再给我们跳一次？

translation.en: -[pauses TV] -Oh, no-no-no-no-no. I couldn't possibly. It'd be too much.
translation.zh: 不要了 我还是算了吧 这样太炫耀了
除非你非要我来！
和科里一起跳
科丽茜 你在干什么？
我要练习
科丽茜科里之舞
噢 耶！
什么？ 科丽茜 停下
科丽茜！
什么？不行 科丽茜！
什么？不行 科丽茜！ 这可是我的舞步 你不能偷走

translation.en: You're not allowed to take it.
translation.zh: 这可是我的舞步 你不能偷走

translation.en: You already took The Chrissy. You aren't taking this one, too.
translation.zh: 你已经抢走了科丽茜之舞不能把这个也学去
科里和科丽茜一起跳？

translation.en: No, Chrissy. I wanna dance alone.
translation.zh: 不 科丽茜 我想自己一个人跳
不再跳了？
睡不着吗？
不是

translation.en: I was just getting a snack.
translation.zh: 我只是找点零食吃
谢谢 妈妈

translation.en: So, you excited about the show tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天的表演 你感到兴奋吗？
是啊 可不是

translation.en: Cory, I'm sorry this week hasn't gone the way you hoped it would,
translation.zh: 科里 真抱歉这周发生的事不如你所愿

translation.en: but I just want you to know, I'm really proud of you.
translation.zh: 但我只想告诉你 我真的很为你骄傲
是吗？

translation.en: Your papa and I are so excited to see you dance on Roll Train tomorrow.
translation.zh: 你爸爸和我明天能看到你上《摇摆列车》了 我们很兴奋呢

translation.en: And what are we supposed to remember before any performance?
translation.zh: 我们在上台表演之前 要记住什么？
要尽情享受
所以明天…
要尽情享受 好吗？

translation.en: [Cory laughs] OK, I will, I will.
translation.zh: 好 我会的

translation.en: [Mama] Now, try to get some sleep.
translation.zh: 现在睡觉吧
好 妈妈

translation.en: That girl loves dancing with her big brother.
translation.zh: 那个女孩很爱和她哥哥一起跳舞

translation.en: Thanks for being such a good one, Cory.
translation.zh: 谢谢你做这么好的大哥哥 科里
晚安
（摇摆列车 科丽茜之舞） 很好

translation.en: [crowd member 1] Oh, I can't wait to see this! [crowd member 2] I have all of their bumper stickers.
translation.zh: -我都等不及要看了-我买了他们所有的贴纸
我爱《摇摆列车》
-她是最棒的舞蹈家-最棒的
观众席最棒的座位

translation.en: Oh, sorry, bit of a wide load here. Comin' through.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我货物宽度超标了 请让一让
谢谢 爸爸
嘿 稍微低下头
卡尔森一家 你们来了
你好 守车
跟我来

translation.en: Looks pretty good all lit up, huh?
translation.zh: 灯光下看起来很不错吧？

translation.en: How we doin', Phil? No fires yet.
translation.zh: -菲尔 怎么样了？-还没起火

translation.en: Cory, we're gonna have you on the lower platform.
translation.zh: 科里 我们需要你站在下方的舞台
-去吧 科里-好的
科丽茜

translation.en: we'll have you up here on the star platform,
translation.zh: 你来上面这个明星舞台

translation.en: right next to you know who.
translation.zh: 就站在那个人旁边

translation.en: And on DJ Train Trax's cue, you'll be lifted up into [echoes] super stardom!
translation.zh: 等火车崔克斯一声令下你就会被升到超级明星舞台

translation.en: Psst. We're live in two minutes, Caboose.
translation.zh: 守车 还有两分钟就要直播了
大家快点各就各位

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -Two minutes till showtime, folks. Let's go! Positions!
translation.zh: 还有两分钟节目就开始了快点各就各位
-准备好了吗？-好了
不
科丽茜 怎么了？
不再跳了
你真会开玩笑 科丽茜
拜托 跳舞时间到了
不再跳了！
哟！
这边是怎么回事？
是科丽茜

translation.en: I'm not sure she wants to do the dance, DJ.
translation.zh: 她好像不太想跳舞 主持人
这样啊

translation.en: I don't understand what could've happened.
translation.zh: 我不知道到底发生了什么事

translation.en: We couldn't get her to stop dancing just yesterday.
translation.zh: 昨天她还跳得停不下来呢

translation.en: Hey, little lady. It's OK. Everyone gets nervous.
translation.zh: 小女孩 没关系的 大家都会紧张

translation.en: We'd hate to do the show without you.
translation.zh: 我们可不想留下你独自一人

translation.en: Are you sure you don't wanna do the dance with us?
translation.zh: 你真的不想和我们一起跳舞吗？
不再跳了

translation.en: All right, that's fine by me. That's cool.
translation.zh: -好吧 那就算了吧-没事的

translation.en: But, uh, we really can't do The Chrissy without Chrissy.
translation.zh: 可是科丽茜之舞没有科丽茜可不行
那就只剩下“之舞”了
所以我们得改名
我们来跳科里之舞

translation.en: represented by Frannie Fenderson Talent Agency.
translation.zh: 弗兰妮·芬德森艺人经纪公司为你呈现

translation.en: I thought you worked for Chrissy.
translation.zh: 我以为你是科丽茜的经纪人

translation.en: I don't follow the puck, Mr. Trax. I head wherever the puck is going to be.
translation.zh: 我不会跟风 崔克斯先生我会引领趋势
等一下 到底要怎么办？
品牌再造

translation.en: Did you know my boy, Cory, here has his own dance called The Cory?
translation.zh: 你们知道我的科里有他自己的舞蹈叫做科里之舞吗？

translation.en: I've seen it. It's even better than The Chrissy.
translation.zh: 我见过 简直比科丽茜之舞还棒
是吗 科里？

translation.en: Did you really come up with your own dance?
translation.zh: 你真的有自己的舞蹈？
嗯 是啊 我有的
没错！

translation.en: Cory, my man, are you OK to do the dance alone?
translation.zh: 科里 你能不能自己跳呢？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I can dance alone.
translation.zh: 可以 我可以自己跳
科丽茜 亲爱的 你去哪儿？
真的很抱歉

translation.en: Please, it's fine. We've got this.
translation.zh: 没关系啦 这里交给我们
科里 你行吗？
嗯 妈妈
我们会看的

translation.en: OK, everyone, we are doing The Cory. I repeat, we are doing The Cory.
translation.zh: 好了 大家 我们要表演科里之舞我再说一遍 我们要表演科里之舞

translation.en: [Phil, over radio] Change it to "The Cory."
translation.zh: 改成“科里之舞”
好的
准备 开拍！

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -[Loose Caboose] All aboard! It's time to hop on the Roll Train!
translation.zh: 各位请上车！《摇摆列车》的时间到了

translation.en: We've got a great show lined up for you tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚我们给大家准备了精彩节目

translation.en: [on TV] If you're in Bumperton Hills, this is the place to be.
translation.zh: 如果你在邦伯顿山 那就来对地方了

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] Give it up for the Roll Train Locomotions!
translation.zh: 掌声有请摇摆列车动车小队！
别太感伤 孩子

translation.en: You're about to get everything you ever wanted,
translation.zh: 你马上就会得到自己想要的一切

translation.en: and I will get ten percent of everything you ever wanted.
translation.zh: 而我会得到你想要的一切的百分之十
-什么？-没什么

translation.en: Pop a tire out there, Cory!
translation.zh: 祝你好运啦 科里
准备好了吗 小伙子？
是啊 应该准备好了

translation.en: Great. I'll do the intro and then my brother will send you up.
translation.zh: 很好 我来做介绍然后我哥哥会送你上去
你哥哥？
是啊 就是那家伙
菲尔？菲尔是你哥哥？
不是啦 是那边那个

translation.en: Let's get camera four ready for DJ's intro.
translation.zh: 四号摄像机准备给主持人

translation.en: The Loose Caboose is your brother?
translation.zh: 脱节守车是你哥哥？

translation.en: Sure is. He's a good one, too.
translation.zh: 当然啦 他可是个好哥哥

translation.en: I wouldn't be up here if it wasn't for him.
translation.zh: 要不是他 我也不会站在舞台上

translation.en: The dance moves, the catch phrases,
translation.zh: 那些舞步 那些流行语
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜

translation.en: He came up with all that.
translation.zh: 都是他想出来的
-真的？-是的

translation.en: He even came up with the name "Roll Train."
translation.zh: 甚至《摇摆列车》这名字也是他想出来的

translation.en: I wanted to call the show "Funky Dance Time."
translation.zh: 我本来想管这个节目叫《放克舞蹈时间》

translation.en: [laughs] That's horrible! [laughs] I know! I know.
translation.zh: -好烂的名字啊-是啊

translation.en: I owe a lot to him. The best part of this show
translation.zh: 我欠他很多呢 这个节目最棒的部分

translation.en: is that we get to do it together.
translation.zh: 就是我们能够一起参与
是啊

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] And now, here's your locomotive of locomotion, everybody's favorite friend of funk--
translation.zh: 现在有请你们的机动车头大家最爱的放克之友…
-到我上场了-火车崔克斯
-到我上场了-火车崔克斯 记住 跳舞没有对错

translation.en: there's no wrong way to dance as long as you're having fun.
translation.zh: 记住 跳舞没有对错 只要你享乐其中就好
上面见了 科里
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！

translation.en: Give it up one more time
translation.zh: 再次把掌声送给摇摆列车动车小队！

translation.en: -for the Roll Train Locomotions! -[Chrissy] Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
translation.zh: 再次把掌声送给摇摆列车动车小队！ 耶！

translation.en: -Whoo-hoo! Woo! -Now, it's time to introduce... -[giggles] -...a very special guest from Bumperton...
translation.zh: 现在 我们要介绍一位来自邦伯顿山的特别来宾！

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] And back to DJ Train Trax.
translation.zh: 镜头回到火车崔克斯

translation.en: -Well, let's get right to it then. -[sighs] Chrissy.
translation.zh: 好了 我们就不多说了 科丽茜
耶！

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, I give you... Cory Carson
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 有请科里·卡尔森

translation.en: performing his new signature dance move-- The Cory!
translation.zh: 来表演他的全新特别舞蹈科里之舞

translation.en: [Loose Caboose] Cut to commercial. Cut to commercial.
translation.zh: 切入广告

translation.en: [DJ Train Trax] We'll be right back.
translation.zh: 我们马上回来
我爱自然泉水
科丽茜？

translation.en: [Mama] Chrissy? Sweetie? [Papa] Come on out, Chrissy.
translation.zh: -科丽茜 亲爱的！-科丽茜 出来吧
科丽茜！

translation.en: Cory? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 科里 你怎么在这里？
科丽茜呢？

translation.en: Oh, she's still a bit camera shy. We can't get her to come out.
translation.zh: 她还是有点怯场 她不愿意出来

translation.en: Do you think I could try talking to her?
translation.zh: 能不能让我试试和她聊聊？

translation.en: OK, people, this is not a drill. We are at Defcon derailed.
translation.zh: 好了 大家伙 这次可不是演习我们面临着战备状态

translation.en: Caboose! W-what do we do? We can't find the kids anywhere!
translation.zh: 守车 我们该怎么办？哪里都找不到那两个孩子

translation.en: I don't know. This is a huge mess!
translation.zh: 我也不知道 这下可一团糟
有人说“一团糟”吗？

translation.en: I've been cleanin' up messes for 28 years.
translation.zh: 我做了28年的清理工作
你是哪位？
科丽茜
科丽茜？
科丽茜 抱歉

translation.en: I got so caught up with being a good dancer,
translation.zh: 我一心想成为一个好的舞者

translation.en: I stopped being a good brother.
translation.zh: 却忘记做好哥哥了

translation.en: This whole thing was supposed to be fun,
translation.zh: 本来这件事应该让我们尽情享乐的

translation.en: but it's no fun without you.
translation.zh: 但是没有你 就没有乐趣了
还记得这个吗？
我管这个叫做“科丽里之舞”

translation.en: [chuckles] I call this move "The Chrissy Cory Crissy-cross!"
translation.zh: 我管这个叫做“科丽茜科里科丽茜之舞”
科里？
科里火车崔克斯
科丽茜 对不起
我们回家吧
不
和科里一起跳
真的吗？
是的

translation.en: Aww. OK, then. [mimics Loose Caboose] Let's get down!
translation.zh: 那好吧 我们去跳吧
来了 崔克斯 这个人说他以前是个歌手

translation.en: This guy said he used to be a singer.
translation.zh: 崔克斯 这个人说他以前是个歌手

translation.en: I think it's our only option at this point.
translation.zh: 现在这是我们唯一的选择了
好吧
终于有机会了！
（科里） 我们要把“科里”改成“清洁工”
我们要把“科里”改成“清洁工”

translation.en: OK, this is where you'll be.
translation.zh: 好了 你就站在这里
崔克斯 你快点就位吧 你跟我来

translation.en: You, follow me. You really saved our caboose.
translation.zh: 崔克斯 你快点就位吧 你跟我来 你真的救了我们的节目
你真的救了我们的节目 就是这里了
我们来了
你们去哪儿了？

translation.en: I didn't wanna go on without my sister,
translation.zh: 我不想留下妹妹自己跳

translation.en: but I talked to her and we're ready to go on together.
translation.zh: 但是我和她聊过了我们准备一起上台
那太好了 小家伙

translation.en: So, what dance are we doing?
translation.zh: 那我们跳哪支舞？
科丽茜之舞

translation.en: [Phil, over radio] Change it back to "The Chrissy."
translation.zh: （清洁工） -改回成“科丽茜之舞”-你自己改吧 我不干了
-改回成“科丽茜之舞”-你自己改吧 我不干了
嘿！

translation.en: Where are you going? There's room up here for you, too!
translation.zh: 你要去哪儿？这里也有你的位置
是啊
真的吗？
我们倒数十秒
十秒 还剩下十秒！
嘿 科里 做得好
你说那支舞？

translation.en: Nah, for being a groovy older brother.
translation.zh: 不 我是说你是个很棒的大哥哥
谢谢你 火车崔克斯
-准备好了吗？-好了
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
欢迎回到《摇摆列车》

translation.en: Next up, we've got quite the treat for you--
translation.zh: 接下来 我们给大家准备了特别节目

translation.en: a voice of satin, a heart of gold,
translation.zh: 美妙之音 金色之心

translation.en: a groovy mustache that doesn't get old.
translation.zh: 一位不会过时的大胡子歌唱家
掌声有请…
这个人！

translation.en: [singing beautifully] ♪ The stars shine brighter together ♪
translation.zh: 星星在一起会更闪亮

translation.en: ♪ What if you and I were together? ♪
translation.zh: 如果你和我在一起呢？

translation.en: It's like listening to an angel.
translation.zh: 就像是天使在歌唱一样
因为我相信你

translation.en: ♪ And if you believe in me, too ♪
translation.zh: 若你也相信我

translation.en: ♪ There's nothing that we cannot achieve ♪ [female crowd member] Aah!
translation.zh: 我们可以逾越一切
我们在一起 万事可成功

translation.en: [DJ Train Trax] And now, Cory and Chrissy Carson performing The Chrissy!
translation.zh: 现在科里和科丽茜兄妹要表演科丽茜之舞
-噢 耶！-噢 耶！
好了 邦伯顿山的观众们
我们来跳吧！
来吧！

translation.en: Ooh, let's get this party started!
translation.zh: 我们来尽情狂欢吧！

translation.en: Kimmy on the Roll Train. Timmy on the Roll Train.
translation.zh: 《摇摆列车》的基米《摇摆列车》的提米

translation.en: -Everybody get on this stage! -Oh, yeah! -Wicky-wicky whoo-whoo! -[laughs]
translation.zh: -大家一起上台吧！-耶 喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
-要一起跳舞吗 孩子的妈？-天呐！

translation.en: It's all about the wipers, baby!
translation.zh: 要看就看雨刷的舞动 宝贝！

translation.en: Come on, Freddie, let's get this train rollin'!
translation.zh: 来吧 弗莱迪 我们来一起摇摆

translation.en: Mom, you've gotta move your tires like this.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你要这样舞动轮胎才行

translation.en: Go ahead, Caboose! Cut it loose!
translation.zh: 来吧 守车 轻松一下吧！
噢 耶 这才是我兄弟
科丽茜之舞！

translation.en: -Oh, yeah! Uh-huh! Ooh-ooh-ooh! -Oh, yeah! Mm-hmm! Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 科丽茜之舞！ -噢 耶！-噢 耶！
这是我的名片

translation.en: Give me a call if you want to talk about your future.
translation.zh: 如果你想聊聊未来计划 给我电话
好了 我们大家一起来吧！
喀嚓喀嚓呜呜！
